007
package edu.wpi.first.networktables;
008
009
import edu.wpi.first.util.function.BooleanConsumer;
010
011
/** NetworkTables Boolean publisher. */
012
public interface BooleanPublisher extends Publisher, BooleanConsumer {
013
/**
014
* Get the corresponding topic.
015
*
016
* @return Topic
017
*/
018
@Override
019
BooleanTopic getTopic();
020
021
/**
022
* Publish a new value using current NT time.
023
*
024
* @param value value to publish
025
*/
026
default void set(boolean value) {
027
set(value, 0);
028
}
029
030
031
/**
032
* Publish a new value.
033
*
034
* @param value value to publish
035
* @param time timestamp; 0 indicates current NT time should be used
036
*/
037
void set(boolean value, long time);
038
039
/**
040
* Publish a default value.
041
* On reconnect, a default value will never be used in preference to a
042
* published value.
043
*
044
* @param value value
045
*/
046
void setDefault(boolean value);
047
048
@Override
049
default void accept(boolean value) {
050
set(value);
051
}
052
}
